Summary: multiple lights in V formation moving west
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Powell
There were no other sightings in Powell on or around November 22nd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side smoking a cigarette facing east when at 1:29 AM i noticed movement to my left so i turned in that direction and seen a group of white lights in a perfect "V" pattern moveing due west at a high rate of speed. there was no sound at all and the lights moved as if attached to a solid object. the sighting lasted only 3 to 5 seconds. i lost sight of them when they passed behind a nearby tree. the altitude it was at was close to where comercial airliners are normaly at. i would estimate that the object was 2-3 times the size of a 747 airliner but that is only if my altitude estimate is correct it could of been higher. i have no idea what it was. ive never seen anything like this before. the lights were a perfect formation. they moved like they were conected to a fixed object. you could see the stars in between the lights as it passed through the sky. its a perfectly clear night. there was one light that seemed to bounce between the other lights twords the front or point of the formation at kind of a medium speed. i know what planes look like especialy military aircraft and i have no idea what this was. ive never seen anything move that fast through the sky before at that altitude except for meteors.
